examples.example: 我每天都会看新闻，了解世界各地的新鲜事。

translate.english: I watch the news every day to learn about the new things around the world.

examples.example: 我喜欢通过新闻来了解社会的动态和发展。

translate.english: I like to understand the dynamics and development of society through the news.

examples.example: 我经常通过新闻来获取积极向上的信息，感受世界的美好。

translate.english: I often obtain positive information through the news to feel the beauty of the world.
